page.title: 12CODDINGTON SCHOOL-EDUCATION
page.content: Childern attend Coddington C.of E. Primary {School}between the ages of 5 and 11. There are 4 infant classes and 5 junior classes.{School}starts at 9.10a.m. and finishes at 3.30p.m. 253 children attend the school (June 1985). The{children}come from Beacon Heights, Newark(38%), Coddington (48%) Barnby (8%), Newark (5%) and Brant Broughton (1%). The subjects taught inciude Maths, Language, Art,Science,P.E.,Music, R.E. and Environmental Studies. Several clubs are held at lunch times and the junior children go swimming on fridays.During the year the children go on several trips. At lunch time children either eat {school dinners}or sandwiches.Favourite school dinners include ravioli, beef burgers and fishcakes, with chips,peas or baked beans and butterscotch tart.
